title: Define User Interest and Behavior Model
description: Create a model that can predict user interests and behavior based on their interactions with the social media platform.

title: Design User Interface for Interest and Behavior Prediction
description: Design a user interface that displays predicted interests and behavior of the user.
dependencies: Define User Interest and Behavior Model

title: Develop Algorithm for Content Recommendation
description: Create an algorithm that recommends content based on the user's predicted interests.
dependencies: Define User Interest and Behavior Model

title: Implement Connection Suggestion Feature
description: Develop a feature that suggests connections based on the user's interests.
dependencies: Define User Interest and Behavior Model

title: Create a Data Collection and Storage Strategy
description: Plan the strategy for collecting user data and storing it securely.

title: Review Data Collection and Storage Strategy
description: Review the data collection and storage strategy to ensure privacy and security.
dependencies: Create a Data Collection and Storage Strategy
